Non-violent death is a **death cause category**. It means that it is a collection of **death causes** and so one can compute the probability of dying from this death cause category by adding up all of its death causes. 

#### Alternative names:
* Illness
* Non-violent death
* NonViolentDeath

#### Death causes

Non-violent death consists of the following causes

* [Alzheimers](/model/Alzheimers)
* [Anemia](/model/Anemia)
* [Appendix Disease](/model/Appendix_Disease)
* [Infant condition](/model/BornWith)
* The death causes of the category [Cancer](/model/Cancer)
* [Childbirth](/model/Childbirth)
* [Chronic liver disease](/model/Chronic_Liver_Disease)
* [Diabetes](/model/Diabetes)
* [Doctor error](/model/DoctorError)
* [Gallbladder disease](/model/Gallbladder_Disease)
* The death causes of the category [Heart disease](/model/HeartDiseases)
* [Hernia](/model/Hernia)
* The death causes of the category [Infectious disease](/model/InfectiousDisease)
* [Kidney disease](/model/Kidney_Disease)
* [Malnutrition](/model/Malnutrition)
* [Other disease](/model/OtherDiseases)
* [Parkinsons](/model/Parkinsons)
* [Peptic ulcer](/model/Peptic_ulcer)
* [Prostate disease](/model/Prostate_Disease)
* The death causes of the category [Respiratory disease](/model/RespiratoryDiseases)
* [Sepsis](/model/Sepsis)
* [Unkown disease](/model/Unknown_Disease)

#### Risk factors

Non-violent death has no [risk factors](/model/intro#risk-factor) in the model (yet).
